EmailTemplate.name: 17.CEM.MotiveCDP.none.N.N.N.18835.CDP PAYG LinkedIN LeadForm.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Turn IoT device growth into business growth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Solution brochure Jump start your IoT device management business Find out how the award-winning Nokia Connected Device Platform (CDP) creates new business opportunities by helping you quickly manage, secure and control all of the Internet of things (IoT) devices on your network.
- Adopt our pay-as-you-go model to lower financial risk and quickly meet new demands
- Offer IoT device management as a service <[[https://goo.gl/HksefW]]> to your enterprise customers - Provide the service level agreements (SLAs) enterprises need Enjoy!
The Nokia Team Connect with us Â© {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
